description: Fired when a clicks inside any carousel (e.g. in the Booking Layer Travel Carousel).

carouselItem.description: The title or name of the item that was clicked in the carousel (e.g. Uluwatu, Bali Surf Villas, etc)

carouselName.description: The name of the carousel or a description of its location in the experience

category.description: The product category this event belongs to (e.g. `kbyg`, `ecommerce`, `sessions`, `travel`, `content`).

path.description: The path portion of the page URL.

positionNumber.description: Number of the card in order from left to right.

provider.description: Who is the carousel data provided by.

referrer.description: The previous pageURL - aka `the page that referred the user to the current page`.

screenName.description: The name of the screen the carousel was clicked on.

search.description: Query string portion of the page URL.

travelZone.description: The zone where the Supplier is located (as designated by Booking Layer).

url.description: The full URL of the page.
